feature - based structured perceptron mo.from sentence:
The model proposed by is a feature - based structured perceptron model with efficient beam - search .
They employ a segment - based decoder instead of token - based decoding .

tree - based dependency layer.which identifies: relations between pairs of candidate entities

SPTree.from sentence: ( SPTree ) recently proposed a LSTM - based model with a sequence layer for entity identification , and a tree - based dependency layer which identifies relations between pairs of candidate entities using the shortest dependency path between them .

employed.from sentence: We also employed our previous approach for extraction of opinion entities and relations to this task .
